Package CodeTest

Class Magazine

java.lang.Object
CodeTest.LibraryItem
CodeTest.Magazine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Borrowable
public class Magazine extends LibraryItem implements Borrowable
Represents a magazine in the library. Extends the LibraryItem class and implements the Borrowable interface.
